title: E.U. Takes Aim at Big Tech’s Power With Landmark Digital Act - The New York Times
content:
1. E.U. Takes Aim at Big Tech’s Power With Landmark Digital Act  The New York Times
  2. EU targets Big Tech with sweeping new antitrust legislation  The Verge
  3. Analysis: New EU rules regulating U.S. tech giants likely to set global standard  Reuters.com
  4. EU reaches agreement on landmark tech regulation legislation | TheHill  The Hill
  5. EU Negotiators Agree on Landmark Law to Curb Big Tech  Voice of America - VOA News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The Digital Markets Act is the most sweeping legislation to regulate tech since a European privacy law was passed in 2018.
